annotations.description: The Daisy is one of the oldest cocktails and is one of what I call a root cocktail. That is a cocktail that gave birth to many many variations. The Daisy was...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Daisy

textContent:
1.5oz Gin
.75 Orange Curacao
.75 Lemon Juice
2 bar spoons cold soda water
Lemon Twist
Coupe/Nick and Nora

Shake and top with 2 bar spoons of soda water
Garnish with lemon twist. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Th4QycrTaHw
title: Daisy
